layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

          text run at (3,23) width 125: "There should be four"

          text run at (3,103) width 135: "should not overlap this"
          text run at (79,123) width 26: "text."
